name: WebGLRenderingContext.getActiveUniform
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.getActiveUniform() method of the WebGL API returns a WebGLActiveInfo object containing size, type, and name of a uniform attribute. It is generally used when querying unknown uniforms either for debugging or generic library creation.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glGetActiveUniform' in OpenGL ES 2.0.
